name: Giant Sea Horse
description: Oversized version of the common sea horse, with long, curling tails and brightly colored bodies that help them blend into coral reefs.
memorable: Often used as mounts by aquatic races due to their calm temperament and strong swimming ability.
goals: Avoid threats and thrive in warm, shallow ocean waters.
relations: Can be found alongside aquatic elves, merfolk, and tritons.
strengths: Graceful swimmers capable of quick movement and strong aquatic maneuverability.
weaknesses: Non-aggressive; relies on avoidance rather than combat.
attacks: Delivers a ram attack, enhanced by a charge that can knock opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Charge: extra bludgeoning damage and a chance to knock opponents prone.
additional_information: Shy creatures that cling to underwater plants.
Trained by aquatic elves as mounts.
test_queries: large colorful ocean creature used as a mount
gentle sea horse found in warm waters
shy creature that can knock targets prone
